trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_SEQ_00<tab>Korutt is eager to step into the relative safety of the cave.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Crystal Exarch.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the Crystal Exarch.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_TODO_02<tab>While invisible, use dream powder on Gogg family dwarves.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the Crystal Exarch.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_000<tab>'Twas a near thing in the end, but what matters is that we pulled through. Well fought, my friend.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KORUTT_000_010<tab>Right, follow me please! I will take you to the Duergar's Tewel, where the purest sulphur in the land may be found!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KORUTT_000_020<tab>Where are they, now...?
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KOGGDWARFA03639_000_023<tab>Who the hells are you!? We don't take kindly to outsiders, so bugger off afore we kick you out!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KOGGDWARFA03639_000_024<tab>Who the hells are you!? If you're not one of us, you must be one of the Tholls! Bugger off afore we kick you out!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KOGGDWARFB0363_000_025<tab>Ahhh! Intruder! Send word to Chief Glagg!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KOGGDWARFC03639_000_026<tab>...Hmmm? Well, such a strange-looking Talos you are.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KOGGDWARFC03639_000_027<tab>...Hmmm? Are you a Gogg? You don't look like a Gogg. That must make you...a Talos. Yes, a Talos.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_030<tab>If the terrain and─<cough>─stench are any indication, we are at the tewel.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KORUTT_000_031<tab>Ah! There!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KORUTT_000_032<tab>The Goggs! With their ugly, unkempt beards!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KORUTT_000_033<tab>If they realize we're here, they'll come after us. Best to take them down first!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_034<tab>Be not so hasty, Korutt. The animosity between your two clans notwithstanding, I would not resort to violence unless necessary.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_035<tab>I will use an enchantment to render you invisible. It will not fool sin eaters, but it will suffice to hide you from the eyes of men.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_036<tab>While you are thus concealed, do you think you could find us the earthseed?
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KORUTT_000_037<tab>Aye, I'll dig up the choicest stuff there is!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_038<tab>We would be much obliged. Without further ado, then...
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KORUTT_000_039<tab>Hah, I can see straight through me! Right, a-digging we will go!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_040<tab>Let us not be idle either.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_041<tab>Though Korutt cannot be seen, he may still be heard. I would aid him by removing some few Goggs from the field. To that end...
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_042<tab>Dream powder. As you may recall, we used it for the rescue mission at Laxan Loft.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_A1_000_001<tab>We used it in Eulmore too.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_A1_000_002<tab>Thancred had some too.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_043<tab>Truly? It seems our alchemists got a little carried away with the latest batch...
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_044<tab>But if it has been useful in our endeavors, then I have no cause to complain.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_045<tab>Now then, I shall make you invisible as well, that you might steal close to the dwarves and give them a dose of dream powder.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_046<tab>Even should it fail to put them to sleep outright, it should render them drowsy enough to seek their beds.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_047<tab>Say the word, and I will cast the enchantment.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_050<tab>Ready to begin? Very good.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_051<tab>Should the enchantment fade before you finish tending to all the dwarves, return to me and I will cast it anew.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_060<tab>Need another dose of invisibility, do you? Very well.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KOGGDWARFA03639_000_070<tab>Who the hells are you!? We don't take kindly to outsiders, so bugger off afore we kick you out!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KOGGDWARFA03639_000_071<tab>Who the hells are you!? If you're not one of us, you must be one of the Tholls! Bugger off afore we kick you out!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KOGGDWARFA03639_000_072<tab>Unnngh, can barely keep my eyes open... Time to call it a day...
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KOGGDWARFB03639_000_073<tab>Ahhh! Intruder! Send word to Chief Glagg!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KOGGDWARFB03639_000_074<tab><yawn> So drowsy... Not safe to work when drowsy... Better get some rest...
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KOGGDWARFC03639_000_075<tab>...Hmmm? Well, such a strange-looking Talos you are.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KOGGDWARFC03639_000_076<tab>...Hmmm? Are you a Gogg? You don't look like a Gogg. That must make you...a Talos. Yes, a Talos.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KOGGDWARFC03639_000_077<tab><yawn> All work and no ale makes...something a something. And I'm spent...
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_080<tab>All the dwarves have taken their leave. Good work, my friend.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_081<tab>We have done all that we can. Let us await Korutt's return.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KORUTT_000_082<tab>I'm back!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KORUTT_000_083<tab>This is the purest stuff there is. Think it's enough, or shall I go and dig up some more?
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_084<tab>I daresay it will suffice for our purposes. You have our gratitude, Korutt.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_085<tab>Let us carry this back to...to...
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KORUTT_000_086<tab>Are you all right!?
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_087<tab>...Worry not, I shall be fine. Long as I have been away from the Crystarium, a little weakness is to be expected.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_088<tab>I may have also overexerted myself in the moment. Ah, to have this rare opportunity yet be unable to enjoy it to the full...
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_GLAGG_000_089<tab>(-???-)Who goes there!?
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KORUTT_000_090<tab>Uwaaah! Th-That's Glagg, chief of the Goggs!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_GLAGG_000_091<tab>You! You're one of the Tholls!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_GLAGG_000_092<tab>I see, I see... Word was our miners were comin' back drowsy, one after the next. I immediately suspected foul play...
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_GLAGG_000_093<tab>And what should I find here but Tholl scum skulkin' about! It's a spineless act befittin' your limp beards!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KORUTT_000_094<tab>What!? I won't stand for that insult!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KORUTT_000_095<tab>Our beards are soft and luscious and smell like freshly tapped ale! Gogg beards are dry and crusty and smell like a knocker's arse!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_GLAGG_000_096<tab>Impudent whelp! Better a hobgoblin's nose hairs than the feeble, floppy things you Tholls have hangin' from your faces!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KORUTTANDGLAGG_000_097<tab>(-Korutt and Glagg-)Grrrrrr!
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_098<tab>Like oil and water... This is not like to end of its own accord.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_099<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, do you perchance have some dream powder left?
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_A2_000_001<tab>Enough to put an end to this.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_A2_000_002<tab>We shouldn't interrupt their conversation.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_A2_000_003<tab>But this was beginning to get interesting...
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_100<tab>Then let us put it to use and be on our way. Though something tells me we've not seen the last of their bickering...
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_101<tab>You are a kind and considerate soul, my friend, but I believe we would be forgiven for needing to hurry. Let us put an end to this and be on our way.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_102<tab>Worry not, my friend. Something tells me you'll have ample opportunity later to witness their bickering. For now, however, we should be on our way.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_GLAGG_000_103<tab>What the swivin'─!?
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_GLAGG_000_104<tab><snore> <snore>
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_105<tab>Forgive me, Korutt, but we need you to be calm as well.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_KORUTT_000_106<tab>I-I'm sorry... It's just, when it comes to the Goggs, I can't help but see red...
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_107<tab>You needn't apologize, my friend. You are here on our account, and we have naught but gratitude for you.
TEXT_LUCKME110_03639_MYSTERYVOICE_000_108<tab>Now that we have what we came for, however, it is time to take our leave. The Talos awaits its heart!
